WeatherRow.Name: Cloudy
WeatherRow.Description: Creatures no longer affected by Sunlight Sensitivity.

WeatherRow.Name: Light Rain
WeatherRow.Description: Creatures no longer affected by Sunlight Sensitivity. -1 to Passive Perception outdoors. Unable to rest outdoors.

WeatherRow.Name: Heavy Rain
WeatherRow.Description: Creatures no longer affected by Sunlight Sensitivity. -2 to Passive Perception outdoors. Unable to rest outdoors.

WeatherRow.Name: Heavy Storm
WeatherRow.Description: Creatures no longer affected by Sunlight Sensitivity. -5 to Passive Perception outdoors. Unable to rest outdoors. Every hour without shelter raises exhaustion by 1.
